params.creatorEntropy: Encrypted random value for assignment randomness
params.name: The name of the game

returns.gameId: The ID of the created game (share this with friends!)

params.gameId: The ID of the game to finalize
The ID of the game to join
params.userEntropy: Encrypted random value for assignment randomness

params.gameId: The ID of the game to reveal

finalizeGame(uint256).notice: Finalize a game and generate assignments (creator only)

revealGame(uint256).notice: Reveal all assignments to everyone (creator only)

userdoc.notice: SECRET SANTA FACTORY  Factory contract to create and manage multiple Secret Santa games. Games are identified by unique IDs - share the ID to let friends join.  FEATURES   Create multiple games with unique IDs  Track all games by creator  Join games by ID  FHE-encrypted random assignments (no one knows who got whom!)  List and browse games  FLOW  CREATE GAME:   1. Creator encrypts entropy   2. createGame(name, entropy)  deploys new game contract   3. Creator auto-registered, gets game ID to share JOIN GAME:   1. Player encrypts entropy   2. joinGame(gameId, entropy)  registered in game FINALIZE:   1. Creator calls finalizeGame() when ready (3+ players)   2. LCG permutation creates encrypted assignments   3. Each player can only decrypt their own target
